alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 4:42AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain midday today will mix with sleet and snow late afternoon and become all snow tonight. Total ice accumulations will range between a trace and 0.20 inches. Total combined sleet and snow accumulations will range between 0.5 inches and 1.5 inches for northwestern counties. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The combined ice, sleet and snow accumulations will make traveling extremely hazardous. Scattered power outages and tree damage may occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
